benchmark_details.name: STORY SUMM
benchmark_details.overview: A benchmark for evaluating methods of faithfulness in summarization, using LLM summaries of narrative stories with localized faithfulness labels and error explanations.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To improve evaluation methods for faithfulness in narrative summarization.

data.source: Short stories collected from Reddit subreddits: r/shortstories and r/shortscarystories.
data.annotation: Annotations were provided by human annotators who labeled summaries as faithful/unfaithful.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated by comparing human labels to model-generated labels across various protocols.
methodology.interpretation: Good performance indicates high fidelity in the automatic evaluation of narrative summarization.
methodology.baseline_results: No metric achieves more than 70% balanced accuracy.
methodology.validation: Different annotation protocols were tested to find effective methods for evaluating faithfulness.
